features: 📸【48MP Digital Camera & HD 4K】 📸 Digital camera has 48 mega pixels and supports 4K high resolution video, and a built-in microphone can help you take clear photos or videos and capture exciting and unforgettable moments. This portable compact camera comes with a 32GB memory card, no need for extra purchase (Please note that the memory card needs to be formatted before use),convenient for you to use this blogging camera directly.

📸【Autofocus Camera】📸 This camera can not only take pictures, but also record videos, and it also has autofocus. In camera mode, you can use the camera to automatically control focus. A focus mark frame will appear on the monitor, allowing the camera to focus at the exact moment you want to capture your subject.

📸【Pause Function & 16X Digital Zoom】📸 Our digital camera supports 16x digital zoom, zoom can be achieved in the details of distant shots. This mini camera also has a pause function, you can pause while recording or playing video by pressing the "OK button". The built-in fill light can help you take high-quality photos in the dark.
📸【Webcam function & 2.8 inch IPS screen】📸 The digital camera can be used as a webcam. With this 2.8 inch camera, you can use various social software to share your life and record exceptional moments.

📸【Two batteries included & Easy to carry】 📸 This portable mini digital camera is very light and small, smaller than a smartphone, you can easily put it in your pocket and carry it anytime, anywhere. Two 700mAh large capacity batteries are included, has longer battery life, and is convenient for you to replace the battery and keep the camera powered up at any time. Small and light, easy to carry, you can shoot while charging.

📸【Multifunction & Best Gift】📸 This digital camera supports multifunction, the digital camera is a webcam, face detection, smile capture, continuous shooting, selfie, beauty function, shutter balance, auto close etc.This compact camera is the best gift for kids,teenagers,beginners and the elderly. The digital cameras offer after-sales protection,If you have any problems or concerns, please feel free to contact us,we will give you a satisfied solution within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUCH a nice digital camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Not only is this little camera super cute, but the quality is actually amazing!!! It is very lightweight yet well made and sturdy. It comes with everything you'll need to use it right away including an SD card and 2 rechargeable batteries!!!! (A charging cord and outlet box to plug into the wall as well) as you can see the quality of the picture on the camera is amazing too!!! I was blown away that it's this easy to navigate use, as well as SUCH a quality camera for the price!!! If you are thinking about it definitely go for it!! 10/10 would recommend for sure!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Budget Camera with amazing quality
reviews.reviewText: This camera is by far one of the best budget camera’s I have tested. Although it does not do well in low light it does amazing in natural light or within any good lighting area’s. This was easy to place in my bag and go and it did not weigh me down. If you are just getting started or want something that you can carry that is not heavy then this camera is def a good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got this camera for our daughter’s birthday in the color pink. It is so great! It came with not only one, but TWO batteries as well as a memory card. It was ready to use instantly! It also came with an adorable lanyard you could attach it to, which my daughter also loved because it was pink and covered with donuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest camera ever
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First off the color of it is just the prettiest shade of pink. The quality of this camera is so good and for the price, you can't pass it up. The auto focus has got to be one of my favorite features about this camera. I recently went on a trip and wish i had gotten this before. It comes with a memory card, 2 batteries, 2 options for carrying straps, and a lense cloth. This is perfect if your looking for a good camera and can't afford major brands. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars im in love with this digital camera 🤍
reviews.reviewText: This camera is super lightweight and small that it makes it quick to take for travel or even just going out on your regular day to day. Whether it’s for taking family photos on a vacation or taking pictures of a scenery while you’re out on a walk, this camera can capture the moment in 4k while still feeling the nostalgia of using a digital camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact camera with 48MP
reviews.reviewText: This autofocus camera is a great entry-level camera for my mom. Recently, she discovered that the photos taken with my camera are quite nice, but she's not familiar with using a camera. This lightweight digital camera is easy for even my mom to learn how to operate, and its 48MP photos are clear enough. My mom loves its compact design, even smaller than a phone, making it easy to slip into her purse along with an extra battery. She appreciates the built-in filters and the self-timer for selfies, and she's grateful for the many beautiful photos it has taken of her and her friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I got this digital camera for my daughter. It is well made, and this package has everything she needs to start taking pictures. It is straight forward to use this camera. My daughter was able to figure out everything by herself. My daughter use it to take clear photos, then she can transfer these photos to her computer for further editing. I’m glad to see her enjoying this digital camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The portable camera is an adorable design with a lovely color palette and a textured matte surface, providing a delightful aesthetic. Its convenient portability is enhanced by the inclusion of a storage bag and a cute hanging rope for easy shooting on the go. And I particularly like about it is its ability to capture high-definition 2.7K videos, delivering impressive photo results with clarity. The half-press shutter function allows for effective focusing. The camera comes equipped with a 32GB SD card, offering ample storage for numerous photos. Additionally, the 16x zoom feature adds versatility to its capabilities. Beyond its role as a camera, it can also function as a webcam. Overall, the combination of its charming design, practical features like HD video recording, clear photo quality, and multifunctionality as both a camera and a webcam make it a versatile and appealing choice for capturing memories on the go.
